name: Street Rat II (Dragon Princes: Fiumenze)
description:
Episode two of a continuing story about a street rat in the city of Fiumenze. Ratto ignores the call to adventure with the Humanist movement, and goes back to his life of crime. But what was that he heard about turning into animals? Surely that's just a folk tale...

Set in the D&D campaign world Tirenia http://tirenia.blogspot.com/

Episode One is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/dpf-street-rat

Thank you to Adam Le Doux for making Bitsy,  ayolland for Borksy and Sean S LeBlanc for the hacks, and all the lovely people who write tutorials and other hacks on here and Discord.
